thread.title: Not all beauty vloggers are like Zoella - these ones are over 50!
thread.title_full: Not all beauty vloggers are like Zoella - these ones are over 50! - Telegraph

author: Eleanor Doughty
title: Not all beauty vloggers are like Zoella - these ones are over 50!
text: Once upon a time, in a land that was part of the internet, there grew up a website called Youtube . And on that website, some people started making videos that they had uploaded. YouTube grew up to be a giant website, worth $40 billion, and soon, more and more people signed up. There’s a chance that you might have heard of YouTube, and you might have heard of a phenomenon called vlogging . It’s like blogging, but on video. Users sit in a room, or walk around their house, town, city, street, neighbourhood, wherever, talking to themselves – or technically, you, the waiting audience – and then hey presto, there’s a video! They cut it together, add some twinkly music in the background , and upload it to the big YouTube portal in the sky. Vlogger Zoe Sugg, aka Zoella, with some of her adoring fans Photo: Matt Anderson/PA Wire Now, such is their influence over the tween population of the world, there's even a magazine dedicated to vloggers . But they're not all spring chickens, freshly hatched from the nest of adolescence. Some of them are legitimate, real grown ups - adults. And because we know how to treat you really well here on GoodLife , we wanted to introduce you to some of our favourite beauty vloggers - that are, wait for it, over 50. Makeup and skincare is something that women of all ages can get on board with, and if you're looking for a right helping hand (of about your own age) then look no further than these ladies. Some of them are bigger than others. None are, as yet, as big as Zoella , but there's still time. Hit these ladies up for your regular dose of beauty favourites, a dose of new product unboxing and every single honest product review that you could ever want. Melissa55 60 year old Melissa lives in East Tennessee with her seven grandchildren and two children close by, and posts makeup tutorials, outfits of the week and Q&A session on her channel. "Every Sunday, I fix a big Sunday dinner and we all gather at our house to recharge our batteries and just have fun together," she says. "If we stick together in this aging journey, we can lift up each other and grow older gracefully and beautifully." Visit her channel here Uppiesbeads59 Tammy from Uppiesbeads59 talks "health skin, mind, body and FOOD!" - her words - on her channel, where she posts new videos a few times a week. Visit her channel here Wheaten Beauty This university academic is "a cosmetic user, a customer" - and, she says, most important, "not an expert". She posts morning and night routines, easy makeup looks and videos as she opens new deliveries of magical beauty goodies. Visit her channel here Lily Seymour Lily is, in her own words, an "over 50s beauty blogger that's fun, fierce, fabulous and not going down without a fight!" On her channel she posts an array of fun videos - from new product reviews to handbag unboxings. Just a lot of fun. She's got a blog too. Visit her channel here Kathy Aay 50-something Kathy Aay has "a ton of ideas to help baby boomers look fabulous," she says. Her fun USP is to do "Docutorials", a mini documentary of a single makeup brand with a corresponding tutorial. She also does hauls, de-clutters and tries out new products on camera. Visit her channel here Hot and Flashy Angie who is behind Hot and Flashy has done it all - from swatching new products to cleaning out her makeup collection, it's all there on her channel. And she's pretty cool too. "If you're looking for how-tos from an actual mature woman" - as she puts it, then Angie is the vlogger for you. Visit her channel here Oh Carol Show 3,172 subscribers • 259,805 views 66 year old Carol, who has seven grandchildren, deals a good hand in Youtubing. Posting everything you could ask for of a beauty guru, she's got monthly favourites, new product reviews and a swatch or two locked down. She's definitely one to watch. Visit her channel here Fabulous Over 50 4,091 subscribers • 187,558 views Makeup artist Nathalie is from Montreal, and has "always had an eternal love affair with makeup and skincare." She shares with Youtube her "aging gracefully journey", and this includes contouring tutorials, makeup brush reviews and brilliant beauty and fashion hauls. Visit her channel here Sensational After 60 2,860 subscribers • 145,779 views 60-something Mary-Ellen wants to give Mother Nature "a run for the money". She reviews new products, demonstrates how she uses her favourites and answers all her viewers' burning questions. Just terribly good fun! Visit her channel here Elle is for Living 13,971 subscribers • 1,194,156 views Fabulous Elle lives in Arizona and believes that "you don't have to spend a lot of money to look great or have a full life". Her channel is packed full of chatty videos, eBay hauls and her empties and favourites - all of which will inspire you. Visit her channel here telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegoodlife
